comment: Labs are easy and textbook is not required. However, he completely forgot to give us one of the tests. Focus on the slides, if you ask what the test will be over he will tell you, study that and you will get an A

All of his tests come from what he gives for homework. If you pay attention in class it will be an absolute easy A. Be prepared though, as he can be boring for lecture. Many people would skip or not pay attention. Attendance is not mandatory for his course. All labs are extremely easy and he is willing to help out. Final lab is an easy project.
Lectures weren't too interesting because can be extremely boring... Test were pretty much identical to homework assignments, and labs were a breeze
Knows very little about course content, be prepared to learn everything yourself without any help from the professor

Unfortunately, the way he teaches his class is extremely boring. I found myself nodding off even with a full nights rest. However, the class is easy to pass as long as you study from the book. You'll have to make your own reading schedule since he doesn't give one, and online help from his website is limited. He's nice and knowledgeable though.
He is a Great Professor. Has lot of stuff. His TA also very helpful in clearing doubts. Getting A grade in his course is easy if u pay attention to watever he says in class. He is BEST.

He knows his stuff, but he has a very thick accent, extremely hard to understand. classes are boring, lectures are almost useless, the class itself is easy, but he's just not good at making himself understood. i made an A learning out of the book
Really not all that helpful. He will refer you to his TA for most of your questions. TA is clueless most of the time.

His tests are difficult and cover all all the material.  If you don't understand something, ask him during class.  Do the homework and every other problem related to it in the book and you'll get an A.
If you want to B without any work and  work little bit and get A. This is the best professor.

Wireless Security: Waste of time. Taught wireless concepts with heavy basis in math and the only discussion of security we even saw was the definition of WEP. I am now "dumber" for having taken the class.
Can't understand what he says. Very unclear and unwilling to help.
You cant understand what he is saying half the time. Does not teach well, so you have to teach yourself. Barely prepares you for test and only explains the subjects well AFTER the tests!
Had to teach myself 'casue the test was different from what he taught.

I would say he is very hard, but somehow I came out with an A.  His English needs work, but other than that he is very intelligent and knows his stuff.  I certainly didn't think I deserved and A... have good attendence and maybe he will treat you as well

Although prof. Faruque really knows his stuff. He is very dificult to understand, he has a thick accent and speaks very softly. He is a desent teacher but you end up teaching yourself because you cant really understand what he said.

good teacher i suppose, seems tohave good insite, kinda annoying how he knows what you will be doing later in the project, but only cause he knows before you, great person though, awesome as a knowledge base
A lot of material to cover in class.
